dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 943 IH: It’s Your Fault Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Ogles introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To amend the Immigration and Nationality Act with respect to fentanyl.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the It’s Your Fault Act.

section.header: Clarifying grounds for inadmissibility of certain aliens

subsection.text: Section 212(a)(2)(C) of the Immigration and Nationality Act (8 U.S.C. 1182(a)(2)(C)) is amended—

paragraph.text: in clause (i), by inserting , including fentanyl or a fentanyl analogue, after in any controlled substance; and
in clause (ii), by striking 5 and inserting 15.
